You may choose new targets for the copy.

trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +1/+1, have flying, and are indestructible.

trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，牺牲一个生物。 若你无法如此作，则牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: ZEN·199 | Eldrazi Monument | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Gods don't die. They merely slumber."\n—Ayli, Kamsa cleric

trans-unit.resname: ZEN·201 | Expedition Map | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: ZEN·228 | Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: ZEN·228 | Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Mountain enters the battlefield under your control, if you control at least five other Mountains, you may have CARDNAME deal 3 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个山脉在你的操控下放进战场时，若你操控至少五个其他的山脉，你可以令CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: ZEN·229 | Verdant Catacombs | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a Swamp or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
